task.title: Refund a Game
task.shortdesc: If you regret a purchase, you may request a refund.

taskbody.context: If you refund a game within 14 days of purchase and have less than 2 hours of total playtime, your refund will be automatically approved. All other refunds may be declined depending on reasoning. Refund requests are typically processed within 24 hours.

step.cmd: In the top right corner, click your username.
Click Account detailsin the dropdown menu.
Select the purchase you'd like to refund from the list of options.
Click I would like a refund.
Click I'd like to request a refund.
Select which payment method you'd like your refund to go to.

substep.cmd: Optionally, type in the Notes text box the exact reason for your refund request.
